description: This is a test script for the SQLite template in a larger project, containing fixtures, tests, and setup code for project initialization, database file generation, and configuration loading.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture to create a temporary directory used across multiple tests.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture to set up a mock template directory with configuration and script files for testing the SQLite project template.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture to create a sample ProjectConfig object for testing.

methods.name: test_sqlite_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that the template init info is correctly retrieved, especially the environment command.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that the project initializes correctly including file creation and template content replacement.

methods.name: test_database_creation(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that running the init_db.py script creates a valid SQLite database with the expected tables and data.

methods.name: test_default_database_name(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Test that a default database name is generated when none is specified in the configuration.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Verify that the post-processing script executes and creates a marker file with expected content.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Test loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that template variables are correctly replaced in generated files.

methods.name: test_sqlite_specific_features(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensure SQLite-specific features like absence of authentication parameters are handled properly.

methods.name: test_entry_point_url(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verify that the entry point URL is generated with expected components.
